translations: 玉米饼；（牌戏中的）切牌人

sentences.sentence: I wonder if I can trouble you to change a 5 pone note?
sentences.translation: 我不知道可不可以麻烦您换开一张5英镑的钞票？

sentences.sentence: "I laid out a hunk of it," I says, "on a piece of a corn-pone."
sentences.translation: “我弄了一大块，”我说，“搁在一块玉米饼上。”

sentences.sentence: There's even a new concept of time - "pre-pone", the opposite of postpone, meaning "to bring something forward".
sentences.translation: 就连表示时间都有新的概念——pre-pone，延期的反义词，意为“提前”。
